messages.message: Incompatible KTXdxgiFormat__ and VkFormat. If KTXdxgiFormat__ is present vkFormat must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED.
messages.details: vkFormat is VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8_UNORM_BLOCK but it must be VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED if KTXdxgiFormat__ is present.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
